mapper.select: SELECT * FROM moim where rownum <= 10 ORDER BY reg_cnt DESC
select c.class_id, a.keyword_name, c.class_name, c.start_date, c.class_price from class c join keyword a on c.keyword_id = a.keyword_id where start_date > current_date

select *from (select b.chall_id, a.keyword_name, b.chall_name, c.ptp_id, c.member_id, d.cert_img_url, d.cert_info from keyword a join challenge b on a.keyword_id = b.keyword_id join chall_member c on b.chall_id = c.chall_id join chall_cert d on c.ptp_id = d.ptp_id order by d.cert_date) where rownum <= 10
